name: Stackby Tool
semantic_context: Read, write, and delete data in Stackby
natural_language_description: 这是 Stackby Tool 节点。主要用于: Read, write, and delete data in Stackby

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Read, write, and delete data in Stackby
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Read, write, and delete data in Stackby | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: append

stackId.name: stackId
stackId.description: The ID of the stack to access
stackId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stack ID | 作用: The ID of the stack to access | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: Enter Table Name | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the record to return
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: ID of the record to return | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 1000

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: view (值: None) - The name or ID of a view in the Stories table. If set, only the records in that view will be returned. The records will be sorted according to the order of the view.

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows | (必填项)
